definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.chinese: 我本質上是一個西方人。

sentences.english: A lot of Occidentals feel puzzled to this question.
sentences.chinese: 許多西方人對此感到困惑不解。

sentences.english: The Boxer Band tunes in to historyThe Boxers’ negative image in the West is of little concern.
sentences.chinese: 當地毫不在意義和團在西方人眼中的負面形象。

sentences.english: Now people in the West calk a useless thing "a white elephant".
sentences.chinese: 而現在西方人則把民用的人成爲“白象”。

sentences.english: The roles have now been reversed, with semi-clad westerners as objects of curiosity on African beaches.
sentences.chinese: 騷胸半掩的西方人在非洲海灘成爲焦點。

sentences.english: This is an easy question for a Chinese to ask, but a Westerner might find it difficult to answer.
sentences.chinese: 這是一箇中國人常問的問題，而西方人卻很難作答。

sentences.english: Hahah comment from occidentals jelous people are so funny.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈哈那些西方人酸溜溜的評論真是好笑。

sentences.english: Most Chinese restaurants in New Zealand feature Cantonese cuisineadapted to Western tastes.
sentences.chinese: 新西蘭大多數中餐館都是適合西方人口味的廣東菜。

sentences.english: I am ashamed of beeing a westerner. / However the hypocrisy of the media knows no bounds.
sentences.chinese: 我真以自己作爲一個西方人而感到羞恥。

sentences.english: Mr Hu doesn’t smile like that for Westerners.
sentences.chinese: 胡主席對西方人從不笑成那樣。

sentences.english: The music seems out of tune to our Western ears, but it has charm.
sentences.chinese: 這曲子我們西方人聽起來不太悅耳，不過挺迷人的。

sentences.english: In this middle age, the West built a middle class.
sentences.chinese: 在這種中間時代，西方人構建了中產階級。

sentences.english: Chinese will pay the bill and check out generously. Occidental don't often entertain guests; but Chinese often invite friend to dinner.
sentences.chinese: 西方人不常款待客人，而中國人卻經常邀請朋友喫飯。

sentences.english: I am just a pampered Western wuss.
sentences.chinese: 我只是個被嬌慣壞了的西方人，一個沒有主見的人。

sentences.english: But by now the people of the West once more recogized a single master.
sentences.chinese: 但是在現在的西方人看來，他是唯一的大師。

sentences.english: Hahah comment from occidentals jelous people are so funny.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈哈哪些西方人酸溜溜地評論真是好笑。
